siteMetadata.title: Trafikito - monitor output of any command
siteMetadata.author: Lukas Liesis

markdownRemark.excerpt: You can detect any possible value of a selected variable range change. You can select these ranges in the when case options while editing notifications.
markdownRemark.html:
You can detect any possible value of a selected variable range change. You can select these ranges in the when case options while editing notifications.

  • Normal → warn
  • Normal → error
  • Normal → any
  • Warn → normal
  • Warn → error
  • Warn → any
  • Error → normal
  • Error → warn
  • Error → any
  • Any → normal
  • Any → warn
  • Any → error
  • Any → any

frontmatter.title: What are possible range changes to detect?
What are the options for an action type: getting and not getting data?
